org.miness.jloglib
Class JLLUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.miness.jloglib.JLLUtils

public final class JLLUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains various utility methods for JLogLib.
It is a singleton, hence there's only one instance at runtime (held by this class itself).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Michel Neeser

Method Summary

          Loads the saved settings state.

Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Method Detail

saveSettings

public void saveSettings()
Saves the current state of all settings.
This saved state will be kept up until the application shuts down.
If you call this method again, the last saved state will be overwritten.
To recover the saved state, call loadSettings().

loadSettings

public void loadSettings()
Loads the saved settings state.
Attention: By calling this method, the current settings will be completely overwritten!
If saveSettings() isn't called before calling this, nothing will happen.

saveSettings

public void saveSettings(java.lang.String path)
Writes the current settings into the specified file.
The data format being used is JSON, so it's very easy to share/recover the settings after writing them.

Parameters:
path - the path to the file to write into.

resetSettings

public void resetSettings()
Resets the settings to the initial state. Attention: By calling this method, the current settings will be completely overwritten!

loadSettings

public void loadSettings(java.lang.String path)
Loads the specified settings from a settings file (JSON data).
Attention: By calling this method, the current settings will be completely overwritten!

Parameters:
path - the path to the file to load settings from.
